This game is very well made and the valve anti cheat system is very effective. I play this game about every day, the community is overall good some players being toxic but that is with every game. Overall this game is one of my favorite games to play and i purchased it back when it did cost some money but now is even free to play which makes this well worth your while to even give a try.
